MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY2 postcode area of Kirkcaldy. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:15pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57am on Tuesday, 09 February 2021
